title: (x) script in Twin Peaks Season One DVD menus - House Script {Paul}
content:
Hello folks-

I’ve searched high and low for this script face from the Twin Peaks Season One DVD menus. Of course I may be blind (entirely likely) but I thought I’d see how you guys fare with it. Apologies for the appalling quality of the samples, and thanks in advance.

-LittleIck

author: LittleIck
